answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Jared,
While ICMA did not have any practice questions I was able to find a past question where members posted resources that their local governments or they themselves used during the six sigma certification process. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21078
I hope this provides you with the assistance you are looking for!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA’s Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Sallie Ann Burnett
answers.text:
Jared – I hope the following is helpful:
Sample Green Belt Certification Examination Questions with Answers
http://www.howardgitlow.com/Sample%20Green%20Belt%20Examination%20Questions.pdf
Practice Quiz Adds Review Questions for the Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam
http://www.prweb.com/releases/2013/3/prweb10487560.htm 
Sample Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification - 
http://www.peoplecert.org/de/Lean_Six_Sigma/Lean_Six_Sigma_Zertifizierungen/Documents/PeopleCert_SixSigma_GreenBelt_SamplePaper_v1.pdf 
Six Sigma Green Belt Training
http://asq.org/six-sigma-training/greenbelt/ready.html
Sallie Ann Burnett
East Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
saburnett@transformgov.org

author: Jared Hershberger
text: I need some help with Six Sigma Green Belt certification. I could really use some practice problems & answers. If possible, it would be great to get some coaching from an experienced Green Belt or Black Belt.
title: Six Sigma Assistance
